```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(jsonlite)


dat_loc <- "sloman_2016/data"
raw <- read_csv(here(dat_loc, "pilot_A.csv")) 


processed <- raw |> group_by(workerid) |> 
  filter(trial_type=="html-slider-response") |> 
  select(workerid, vignette=id, item_type, response, rt, trial_index)
  
```
